text: Ebüzziya Mehmed Tevfik (1849 – 1913) was an Ottoman educator, intellectual and writer, whose ideas contributed to the formation of the Turkish national identity during the early decades of the Turkish Republic.https://islamansiklopedisi.org.tr/ebuzziya-mehmed- tevfikhttps://www.biyografi.info/kisi/ebuzziya-tevfik == References == Category:1849 births Category:1913 deaths Category:People from Istanbul Category:19th-century writers of the Ottoman Empire
title: Ebüzziya Tevfik
